name: consummation
description: ### A test project to test out my skills.

scripts.install-deps: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i && echo All dependencies were installed
scripts.env-create: mv server/.env.example server/.env && mv client/.env.example client/.env
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.seed: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
